short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change things to be of the Hoff.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: About once in every 500 page loads, your web session will be redirected to a video of David Hasselhoff singing "Hooked on a Feeling" for about 30 seconds before bringing you back to your standard web browsing pleasure.
